questions.question: Have you tried running it on a Raspberry Pi?
questions.answer: I have, thanks for asking! This app is certified to run on a potato.

questions.question: What's the point of all this anyways?
questions.answer: Well, Wix won't be around forever. Someone's gotta know how to do the cool stuff. Plus I learned a ton.

questions.question: So you're like...a Web Developer?
questions.answer: No. I like building cool stuff, and the web technology suite is what I'm most familiar with. I'd love to do native C++ again, learn Arduino, etc.

questions.question: Do you loathe CoffeeScript?
questions.answer: Yes. Call this 26 year old old-fashioned, but it's unneccesary.
